description.en:
REAPit is a chat-based wallet that enables anyone to add liquidity to uniswap pools, swap, tip , buy, sel tokens.

As long as there is everyday conversation between social media apps, as long as crypto currencies will always be sent out or receive by over 1 million users daily. There will be always a reason to make use of REAPit Wallet. The DApp was created as a solution to how stressful crypto payments can be.
